about.title: Welcome to Our Church Family
about.description: We are a Seventh-day Adventist community dedicated to sharing God's love. Join us every Sabbath (Saturday) to worship, learn, and grow together.
about.pastorWelcome: We believe God has brought you here for a reason. Whether you're exploring faith or seeking a deeper relationship with Christ, our doors and hearts are open to you.
about.mission: Our mission is to share God's love through worship, fellowship, and service — building a community where faith grows and hope flourishes.

bibleCentered.title: Bible-Centered
bibleCentered.description: Grounded in Scripture with meaningful teachings.

welcoming.title: Welcoming
welcoming.description: A warm family where everyone belongs.

about.welcomeMessage: Whether you're seeking spiritual growth or simply a place to belong — you're welcome here.

planVisit.title: Plan Your Visit
planVisit.subtitle: We're excited to meet you! Here's everything you need to know for a comfortable first visit.

expect.title: What to Expect
expect.description: A warm welcome awaits you! Our services include worship music, prayer, and a Bible-based message.

children.title: Children's Programs
children.description: We have dedicated programs for children of all ages during our Sabbath services.

dress.title: What to Wear
dress.description: Come as you are! We have a mix of casual and semi-formal attire.

parking.title: Parking & Location
parking.description: Free parking available on-site. We are located in Bang Phutsa, Sing Buri.

connect.title: Connect With Us
connect.description: We'd love to meet you! Stop by our welcome desk after service.

sermons.title: Latest Message
sermons.subtitle: Missed a Sabbath? Catch up on our recent sermons.

prayer.title: Share Your Prayer Request
prayer.verse: Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
prayer.description: Our prayer team is here to support you. Every request is treated with care and confidentiality.
prayer.prayerTeamNote: Your request will be prayed over by our dedicated prayer team
